paper_title.en: Unilateral mandibular distration and its relapse in a patient with facial asymmetry and microgenia

paper_title.ja: 鹿児島大学歯学部附属病院矯正科における口唇口蓋裂患者の20年間の推移
小下顎症を伴った顔面非対称の1例においな下顎骨延長術と後戻り
おクルーザルスプリントと肘関節屈曲筋群の等尺性筋力との関連
小下顎症を伴った顔面非対称の 1 例における下顎骨延長術と後戻り
paper_title.en: Mandibular distraction and its relapse in a facial asymmetry case with microgenia

description.ja: 下顎骨の骨延長術(distraction osteogenesis;以後DOG)は小下顎症に対する治療法の1つとして用いられているが, その後戻りについては明らかでない.本研究では, 片側下顎骨体にDOGを適用した小下顎症を伴った顔面非対称の1例について術後4年間の後戻りの経過を報告する.症例は初診時 女で, 主訴はオトガイの右偏と後退であった. に右側顎関節強直症に対して授動術を受けていた.下顎骨の成長促進を目的に, までFKOとJasper Jumperを使用したが改善されなかった. , 片側下顎骨体にDOGを適応することとし, 右側下顎角部に骨切りを行い, 下顎骨体に平行に延長器を装着した.術後11日目より36日間延長を行った.右側下顎骨体は16.7mm延長され, オトガイは前方へ11.3mm, 正中へ13.0mm移動した.また, 下顎体は左側下顎頭を支点として左方へ回転したため, 右側臼歯部は開咬となった.延長終了6カ月後には右側下顎骨体長は1.2mm(7.2%)減少し, オトガイは右方へ1.9mm(14.6%)後戻りしていた.延長終了4年後では, 右側下顎骨体長は1.7mm(10.2%)減少し, 下顎体は左側下顎頭を支点として右方へ回転していたため, オトガイは右方へ2mm(15.4%)後戻りし, 顔面非対称はわずかに再発したが, オトガイの前後的位置は安定していた.以上から, 下顎骨体の片側性の延長による下顎体の左方回転が, 早期に下顎体の右方回転と下顎骨体長の後戻りを生じさせた可能性が示唆された.
description.en: This paper reports the application of distraction osteogenesis (DOG) at the right mandibular body in a facial asymmetry case with microgenia and its relapse sequence. Patient was an girl with complaints of the right side deviation and retrusion of the chin. She had a history of ankylosis of the right TMJ which was surgically mobilized. FKO and Jasper Jumper were applied to accerelate the madibular growth, but no good result. At , unilateral mandibular body osteotomy was performed just medial to the right mandibular angle. A distractor was placed parallel to the mandibular body and elongated for 36 days. The right mandibular body length increased 16.7 mm, which moved Pogonion 11.3 mm forward and menton 13.0 mm midward. At the same time, the mandible rotated leftward on the left TMJ to cause openbite in the right molars region. At 6 months after DOG, the right mandibular body length decreased 1.2 mm and Menton moved 1.9 mm rightward. After 4 years, the rotation of mandible returned to the middle and the right mandibular body length decreased 1.7 mm, than Menton moved 2.0 mm rightward without antero-posterior relapse of Pogonion. It was suggested that unilateral DOG of mandibular body caused the lateral rotation of mandible, which might cause the lateral relapse of Pogonion and decrease the mandibular body length unilaterally.

publication_name.ja: Orthodontic waves : journal of the Japanese Orthodontic Society : 日本矯正歯科学会雑誌

paper_title.ja: オクルーザルスプリントと肘関節屈曲筋群の等尺性筋力との関連
paper_title.en: Relationship between the occlusal splint and the isometric strength of elbow flexor muscles

description.ja: 本研究では, スプリント装着が叢生者の肘関節屈曲筋群の等尺性筋力に及ぼす影響を検討した.対象は正常咬合者13名(N群), 叢生者15名(C群)である.対合歯と接触している歯数(咬合接触歯数)は, C群がN群に比べて有意に少なかった.スプリントとして, 全歯接触型のオクルーザルスプリントと, その咬合面部を切除したプラセボスプリントを用いた.スプリント非装着(NS), プラセボスプリント装着(PS), オクルーザルスプリント装着(OS)の3条件下で肘関節屈曲筋の等尺性筋力を測定した.NSの測定値に対するPSおよびOSの測定値の増大量と増大率を算出し, 測定値, 増大量および増大率を測定条件間で比較した.また, 全被検者について, 筋力の増大と咬合接触歯数との相関係数を求めた.平均筋力, 最大筋力ともに, N群では, OSがNSに比べて有意に大きかったが, NSとPS, PSとOSには有意差がなかった.一方, C群では, NSとPSには有意差がなかったが, OSはNSおよびPSに比べて有意に大きかった.N群の平均筋力と最大筋力にはPSによる増大とOSによる増大に有意差がなかったが, C群の平均筋力はPSによる増大に比べてOSによる増大が増大量でも増大率でも有意に大きく, 最大筋力でも増大率が有意に大きかった.OSによる平均筋力の増大量, 増大率と咬合接触歯数の相関係数はそれぞれ-0.41, -0.40でともに有意であった.以上から, 叢生者ではオクルーザルスプリント装着により肘関節屈曲筋群の等尺性筋力は増大するが, 咬合力が多くの歯に分散するためと考えられた.
description.en: The purpose of this study was to investigate the relationship between the application of occlusal splint and the isometric strength of elbow flexor muscles. Subjects were 13 normal occlusion (Group N) and 15 tooth-crowding (Group C). The number of occlusal tooth contact in Group C was significantly smaller than in Group N. The occlusal splint and the placebo splint were fabricated. The muscle strength were measured in three different conditions, such as without any splint (NS), wearing the placebo splint (PS) and the occlusal splint (OS). Both the amount and the rate of increase at PS and OS were calculated, and the muscle strength was compared among the three conditions. Further, the coefficients of correlation between the increase of muscle strength and the number of occlusal tooth contact were analyzed among all subjects. Both the average and the peak torques at OS were significantly larger than those at NS in Group N, while there were no significant differences between NS and PS nor PS and OS. Both the average and peak torques at OS were significantly larger than those at NS and PS in Group C, while there were no significant differences between NS and PS. The amount and the rate of increase of average torque, the rate of increase of peak torque at OS significantly increased than those at PS. The coefficients of correlation between the increase of average torque and the number of occlusal tooth contact at OS were -0.41 for the amount of increase (P<0.05), -0.40 for the rate of increase (P<0.05). These results suggest that the isometric strength of elbow flexor muscles was increased by the application of occlusal splint in tooth-crowding subjects, because the occlusal splint might disperse the occlusal force to more teeth.

publication_name.ja: Orthodontic waves : journal of the Japanese Orthodontic Society : 日本矯正歯科学会雑誌

paper_title.ja: 正常嚥下者と舌突出型嚥下者における舌背の上下運動の超音波解析
paper_title.en: Ultrasound analysis of the up-down movement of tongue dorsum in subjects with normal and tongue thrust swallowing

description.ja: 超音波診断装置を用いた解析法を検討するため, 女性の正常嚥下者15名(NS群)と舌突出型嚥下者10名(TT群)にジュース5mlを嚥下させ, 下顎両側第一大臼歯を通る前頭断面の舌背の上下運動をMモード画面で撮影した.上下運動を上昇相, 接触相および下降相に分け, それぞれをタイプ分けし, 上昇距離, 時間および速度等を計測した.1. タイプ分けによれば, 上昇相には舌背がただちに上昇するダイレクト型と一旦沈み込んでから上昇するバウンド型の2つがあり, 前者にはNS群の9名, 後者にはNS群の6名とTT群の10名が含まれていた.接触相には, 長プラトー型, 短プラトー型, 非プラトー型の3つがあり, 長プラトー型にはNS群の6名, 短プラトー型にはNS群の3名とTT群の5名, 非プラトー型にはNS群の6名とTT群の5名が含まれていた.しかし, 下降相ではどの被検者もただちに下降して, タイプ分けができなかった.2. 計測値によれば, 舌背の上昇距離はTT群がNS群より, バウンド型がダイレクト型より有意に大きかった.また, 接触時間は接触相の3つの型の間で有意差があった.3. タイプ分けあるいは計測値で有意差のあった上昇距離と接触時間の2項目で散布図を描くと, 各被検者は上昇距離では分かれないが接触時間では3つのグループに分かれ, しかも各グループは長プラトー型, 短プラトー型, 非プラトー型に対応していた.4. 以上から, 舌背が上昇して口蓋と接触する接触相の型ないしは接触時間が, 嚥下時の舌機能評価に有効な指標となることが示唆された.
description.en: To analyze the swallowing tongue movement using the ultrasound unit, its M mode images of the movement was recorded in the frontal section through the mandibular first molars in 15 normal swallowing (NS) and 10 tongue thrusting (TT) females. The ascending, contacting and descending phases of the up-down movement of tongue dorsum were classified and analyzed. 1. In the ascending phase, the direct type in which the tongue dorsum ascending directly and the bound type in which it descending before ascending were classified. The former contained 9 subjects of NS, and the latter did 6 subjects of NS and 10 subjects of TT. In the contacting phase, the long plateau, short plateau and non-plateau types were classified. The long plateau type contained 6 subjects of NS, the short plateau type did 3 subjects of NS and 5 subjects of TT, and the non-plateau type did 6 subjects of NS and 5 subjects of TT. 2. The ascending distance was significantly larger in TT and the bound type compared to NS and the direct type. The palatal contact duration showed significant differences among three types of the contacting phase. On the scattergram, subjects were separated into three groups by the palatal contact duration. 3. It was suggested that types of the contacting phase and the palatal contact duration might be useful indicators for the evaluation of tongue function during swallowing.

paper_title.en: Ulrtasound analysis of the up-down movement of tongue dorsum in subjects with normal and tongue thrust swallowing
Hyoid position, pharyngeal airway and head posture in relation to relapse after the mandibular setback in skeletal Class III

description.en: This study evaluates the process of relapse after mandibular setback surgery by an analysis of the role of craniofacial morphology, hyoid position, pharyngeal airway and head posture. Subjects examined were 62 patients who received the sagittal split ramus osteotomies (SSRO). Changes of the craniofacial and related structures were evaluated from the serial cephalograms up to 3 years after the surgery. Results indicated that mandibular relapse represented by Pg occurred mostly within 6 months after the surgery. A net setback of the mandible was 9.1 mm and the superior move was 1.7 mm, with a reduction of 7.2 mm in mandibular length, 4.2 mm in ramus height, 3.7 mm in posterior face height, 2.6° in gonial angle, an increase of 2.9° in mandibular plane angle (MPA) by the last examination. Hyoid bone moved backward and downward and head posture was raised. The forward relapse of Pg was correlated with the changes of ANB, MPA, ramus height and hyoid position. Only hyoid position was predictably correlated with mandibular morphology and head posture. These findings suggest that mandibular setback alters the relationship among the hyoid position, pharyngeal airway and the head posture. It might be critical, therefore, relapse is closely monitored and controlled before the full healing of fragments and new muscular balance is established. © Munksgaard 2000.

paper_title.ja: 思春期女子上顎前突の顔面骨格型とその成長変化に及ぼす噛みしめ型 FKO の影響
paper_title.en: Facial skeletal patterns of maxillary protrusion and effects of the biting type FKO on their growth changes in pubescent girls

description.ja: 思春期の1年間(a時点-b時点)に噛みしめ型FKOを使用した女子上顎前突症例50人を, a時点の側方頭部X線規格写真からshort face(S群)とlong face(L群)に分け, 顔面骨格の成長変化を比較した.1. a時点では, S群のY-axis, ∠MP-FH, ∠MP-SN, Gonial angle, ∠ANB, N-Me, Ag to MPがL群より小さく, Facial angle, ∠SNB, Cd-Go, Go-Pog', S-Go, S-Go/N-Meが大きかった.b時点では, S群の∠SNAがL群より増大し, N-Meで差が消失したが, それ以外ではa時点と同じく差があった.2. 両群とも角度計測と前後顔面高比には有意な成長変化がなかったが, 距離計測のCd-Gn, Cd-Goが両群とも増大し, Go-Pog', N-Me, S-GoはS群だけが増大した.成長変化の大きさを見ると, 距離計測と前後顔面高比には群間に差がないが, 角度計測のY-axis, ∠MP-FH, ∠ANBには差があった.3. 平均的プロフィログラムによると, a時点ではL群の顔面骨格がS群より後方にあり下顎下縁平面角が大きい.しかしb時点では, 両群の顔面骨格のずれが減少してオトガイも互いに近づいていた.また, S群では下顎骨が前下方に平行に成長してPogは下方に移動していたが, L群では下顎骨の前方成長が著明でPogは前下方に移動していた.4. 噛みしめ型FKOはどちらの顔面骨格型にも影響を及ぼし, その結果両群の顔面骨格型が互いに近づくことが示された.
description.en: To compare the effect of biting type FKO on the growth of different facial skeletal patterns, fifty girls of maxillary protrusion treated by the FKO at their puberty were classified into the short (S) and long (L) face groups. Growth changes of their facial skeleton were analyzed using two sets of cephalograms. At the first set, Y-axis, ∠MP-FH, ∠MP-SN, Gonial angle, ∠ANB, N-Me and Ag to MP were smaller but Facial angle, ∠SNB, Cd-Go, Go-Pog', S-Go and S-Go/N-Me were larger in group S. By the second set, most of them represented the same differences. Between the two sets, no significant changes were observed in angular measurements and S-Go/N-Me, whereas Cd-Gn and Cd-Go increased in both groups but Go-Pog', N-Me and S-Go did only in group S. Linear measurements and S-Go/N-Me showed no different changes between two groups, but Y-axis, ∠MP-FH and ∠ANB did. By the superimposition of facial diagrams, facial skeletons in group L were more posteriorly oriented with a steeper mandibular plane. These characteristics reduced and Menton came to be closer. The mandible grew in an antero-downward direction without changes of the mandibular plane angle in group S, while it grew in a forward direction in group L. These findings suggested that the biting type FKO effects on both facial skeletal patterns to bring them closer to each other.
